column5: For those that go to Canada by way of the Falls, the article below details a fire at the Y knot Gas Station in Pelland Junction, MN, SW of International Falls. Looks like the store was burglarized and then caught fire, and the burglar refused to come out, leading to his death. Sad for the community and the employees, and sad for those of us who used this as a fuel stop to and from Canada.http://www.ifallsjournal.com/news/lo...45a1fa490.html
To bad, never a good thing to lose a business and a life. Sounds like the guy had some reason not to be arrested for a simple burglary.
That's a shame. Hopefully they can rebuild. We almost always fuel there, before crossing the border. More room to maneuver than at the duty free pumps and also had diesel available.
Same here. Easier to get in and out of and they had diesel. I hate fueling in town. Sportfisher
